:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1900 Dual-Band LTE Wi-Fi Modem Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.asus.com/Networking/4G-AC68U/}} ;Connectivity Technology :LTE: Downlink 300 Mbps / Uplink 50 Mbps :HSPA+: Downlink 42.2 Mbps / Uplink 5.76 Mbps :4G FDD-LTE: 800 /1800 /2100 /2600 :4G TDD-LTE: 2600 :3G UMTS: 900 /2100 ===Reviews=== *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/review-asus-4g-ac68u-wireless-router ''ASUS 4G-AC68U review'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] *[https://www.4gltemall.com/asus-4g-ac68u.html ''ASUS 4G-AC68U manual'' on '''4G LTE Mall'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1928-asus-4g-ac68u-ac1900-modem-i-router-lte-wi-fi/ ''Asus 4G-AC68U'' on '''OpenITforum'''] :[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/264-asus-4g-ac68u/ ''Gallery (external image)''] ===See also=== :;[https://www.asus.com/Networking/4G-LTE-3G-Routers-Products/ 4G LTE Routers Products] *[[ASUS 4G-AC68U]] (AC1900) • 90IG03R1-BM2000 *[[ASUS 4G-AC55U]] (AC1200) • 90IG01H0-BM3000 *[[ASUS 4G-AC53U]] (AC750) • 90IG04A1-BO3000 • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/4G-AC53U/ PPage] *[[ASUS 4G-N12 B1]] (N300) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/4G-N12-B1/ PPage] *[[ASUS 4G-N12]] (N300) • 90IG01I0-BM3G00 __NOTOC__
